sentences.sContent: We hope to have test flights in this decade.
sentences.sContent_eng: We hope to have test flights in this decade.
sentences.sCn: 我们希望在这十年进行试验飞行。

sentences.sContent: If not, ask God to help you establish goals for your decade of destiny.
sentences.sContent_eng: If not, ask God to help you establish goals for your decade of destiny.
sentences.sCn: 如果没有，那么请上帝帮助你建立你的命运十年的目标。

remMethod.val: deca(十) + de → 十年， 十年期
